addWhitelistedAppContracts(uint256,addre.details: Adds whitelisted application contracts. Only the DAO address can call this function.

params._contracts: An array of contract addresses to whitelist.

params._daoAddress: The address of the DAO contract.
params._endDate: The end date of the program.
params._startDate: The start date of the program.

isContractWhitelisted(uint256,address).details: Returns whether a contract address is whitelisted for a specific app.

params._contractAddress: The address of the contract to check.

returns._0: True if the contract is whitelisted, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeWhitelistedApp(uint256).details: Removes all whitelisted contracts for a specific app. Only the DAO address can call this function.

removeWhitelistedAppContract(uint256,add.details: Removes a specific whitelisted contract for a specific app. Only the DAO address can call this function.

params._contractAddress: The address of the contract to remove.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBeneficiaryApp(uint256,address).details: Sets the beneficiary address for a specific app. Only the owner can call this function.

params._beneficiary: The wallet address of the beneficiary.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateDaoAddress(address).details: Updates the DAO contract address. Only the owner can call this function.

params._newDaoAddress: The new address of the DAO contract.

updateProgramDates(uint256,uint256).details: Updates the program start and end dates. Only the owner can call this function.

params._newEndDate: The new end date of the program.
params._newStartDate: The new start date of the program.

updateRules(uint256,(uint256,uint256)[]).details: Updates the reward rules and fixed reward percentage.

params._newRewardRules: A mapping of amount to reward percentage.
